short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to make Zoom's .txt chat files more human-readable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of struggling to read your saved Zoom chats? Simply upload your .txt file here to view saved Zoom chats in a more human-readable way!
